text: Alan Cumming’s husband is currently a huge topic of discussion among fans after the actor was confirmed to be a part of Avengers: Doomsday. The Scottish thespian is officially reprising his role as Nightcrawler in the upcoming Avengers sequel, which will also mark his debut in the MCU. As such, fans are eager to know more about Cumming’s personal life, including details about his husband. So, here’s all you need to know about the veteran actor’s spouse, including his profession and the couple’s relationship. What is Alan Cumming’s husband’s name? Alan Cumming’s husband’s name is Grant Shaffer. The celebrity couple kickstarted their romance back in 2005, having encountered one another through mutual friends. (via Closer Weekly) Cumming and Shaffer eventually exchanged vows in a civil ceremony in London in 2007. A whopping five years after their first nuptials, the pair held a second wedding in January 2012 at New York’s Soho Grand Hotel, seemingly to commemorate the legalization of same-sex marriage in New York. What is Grant Shaffer’s age? Grant Shaffer is around 60 years old. This means the age difference between him and Alan Cumming is negligible. Born on January 27, 1965, Cumming celebrated his 60th birthday earlier this year, which suggests that he and his husband are almost the same age. Meanwhile, Shaffer was born in 1965 in California. What is Grant Shaffer’s job and what does he do for a living? Grant Shaffer is a visual artist. As per Shaffer’s official website, he has specialized as an illustrator for over 25 years, with his works making it to renowned publications such as The New Yorker, The New York Times, and Interview Magazine. He also works as a professor of art and currently heads illustration and general art courses at the School of Visual Arts and the Hetrick-Martin Institute, respectively. Moreover, the veteran artist has undertaken multiple storyboarding projects throughout his career. Shaffer has not only conceptualized videos for artists like Beyoncé, Madonna, and Michael Jackson, but also made contributions to high-profile movies like Tick, Tick… Boom!, Zoolander, and The Girl on the Train, among others. Do Alan Cumming and Grant Shaffer have kids? Alan Cumming and Grant Shaffer don’t have any children. The couple recently celebrated 18 years of marriage. Sharing a sweet snap from their first wedding ceremony on Instagram, Cumming wrote, “Eighteen years ago I married @granteepants and we’re still laughing. Happy anniversary my man.”
